thread.title: Shooting championship gets underway at KSSR
thread.title_full: Shooting championship gets underway at KSSR - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shooting championship gets underway at KSSR
text:
NEW DELHI: Biggest shooting competition of 2015 has been organized by Sportzcraft at the Dr Karni Singh Shooting Range here. They used virtual reality technology to redefine how sports like shooting championship can be watched. The championship is an initiative to prepare the shooters for the Olympics and Rio games.
Winners of this championship will directly get an entry in nationals. Managing director, Sportzcraft explained enthusiastically at the championship, "Sportzcraft has been very passionately planned. We promise to go the extra mile to redefine how sports like shooting championship can be watched with the help of virtual reality technology."
Further, totaling to the excitement of the championship he/she adds, "virtual reality is a young technology, which has been used in giving real experience to the people who loves watching videos and being used in other businesses like shopping etc. But this is the first time we have introduced it for the betterment of the sports like shooting and planning to redefine other sports as well".
